#1 open source Flash CMScross media, cross platform, cross canal, multimedia assembler !Silex, designer friendly publishing platformSILEX is a new kind of CMS (Content Management System),a mix between editing software and wiki based software. All multimedia file formats can be assembled in SILEX WYSIWYG editor for publishing website online, in a local computer and on CD-R.

#1 open source Flash CMS

cross media, cross platform, cross canal, multimedia assembler !

Silex, designer friendly publishing platform

SILEX is a new kind of CMS (Content Management System),

a mix between editing software and wiki based software.

All multimedia file formats can be assembled in SILEX WYSIWYG editor for publishing website online, in a local computer and on CD-R.
